metadata.title: CVE-2016-10165 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The Type_MLU_Read function in cmstypes.c in Little CMS (aka lcms2) allowsremote attackers to obtain sensitive information or cause a denial ofservice via an image with a crafted ICC profile, which triggers anout-of-bounds heap read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblcms2-2 - 2.6-3ubuntu2.1
liblcms2-utils - 2.6-3ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lcms2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6-3ubuntu2.1').
